shapes: add missing BezierCurve thickness property
docs: docstring fixes, and rename graphics.rst -> rendering.rst

Added a None check to ShapeBase.delete (#1075)

ShapeBase.delete was not checking if self._vertex_list was not None before calling self._vertex_list.delete(). This could occasionally result in AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'delete'

verification.payload:
tree 385d0e81c0ab1a41ba6475cf064d2cd9128b86d7
parent a35cd7d0ffb4165dcd4f91b68787a12ce3a905e1
author James-Bonner <159219948+James-Bonner@users.noreply.github.com> 1710683365 +1100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1710683365 +0900

Added a None check to ShapeBase.delete (#1075)

ShapeBase.delete was not checking if self._vertex_list was not None before calling self._vertex_list.delete(). This could occasionally result in AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'delete'

commit.message:
Additional TextLayout Adjustments (#1070)

* Clean up win32 legacy font renderer to remove unused or outdated code.
Add some typing.

* Remove outdated example and code.

* Broken tests. Fixed inline image.

* Cleanup.

* Start refactoring.

* Further cleanup before bigger changes.

* Boxes are now primary update method for TextLayout instead of relying on the vertex_list of the TextLayout

* More refactoring, typing.
Boxes now dictatate the vertex lists deletions/updates for layouts except Incremental.
Incremental Text now working.
Fix inline tests.
Add underline to HTML example.

* Typing for Scrollable Layouts

* Create __all__ for layout.
Change uses to pyglet.text.layout

verification.payload:
tree 8aaa32aabfc264fd11330f4fc76aed1a1ec6a1f6
parent 794bd08741f1c70b1315a3b13bc2caf6c81bd381
author caffeinepills <vhxonline@gmail.com> 1710299572 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1710299572 +0900

Additional TextLayout Adjustments (#1070)

* Clean up win32 legacy font renderer to remove unused or outdated code.
Add some typing.

* Remove outdated example and code.

* Broken tests. Fixed inline image.

* Cleanup.

* Start refactoring.

* Further cleanup before bigger changes.

* Boxes are now primary update method for TextLayout instead of relying on the vertex_list of the TextLayout

* More refactoring, typing.
Boxes now dictatate the vertex lists deletions/updates for layouts except Incremental.
Incremental Text now working.
Fix inline tests.
Add underline to HTML example.

* Typing for Scrollable Layouts

* Create __all__ for layout.
Change uses to pyglet.text.layout

commit.message:
Xaudio2 fixes + test fix (#1068)

* Fix missing ) to POINTER which causes XAudio2 to fail to be imported.

* Add ImportError instead of catching any exceptions for import.

---------

Co-authored-by: caffeinepills <>

Xaudio2 fixes + test fix (#1068)

* Fix missing ) to POINTER which causes XAudio2 to fail to be imported.

* Add ImportError instead of catching any exceptions for import.

---------
